title: The Adventure Zone: Live in San Francisco!
description: Our heroes receive a letter from an old friend requesting their aid on the open seas. Spurred on by the promise of incredible treasures, Tres Horny Boys set sail -- but what dangers await them beneath the ocean's waves?
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
